information.title: End of Year Revival: It's Not Too Late
information.description: Join the Columbus Ghanaian SDA – English Service as they end the year with a mega revival summit.

content.text: Life is full of ups and downs. 2021 is coming to an end and a lot happened this year, some people received their blessings while other people’s hearts are full of hatred, disappointments, unforgiving, jealousy and so many things.

However you are feeling “ITS NOT TOO LATE” Join the Columbus Ghanaian SDA – English Service as they end the year with a mega REVIVAL SUMMIT. This will make a huge difference in how you end the year. Every night at 7:30pm from December 25th to January 1st.
End the year with a blessed heart and your life will not be the same in the year 2022.
